bug.author: MJOAN
bug.description: Describe the bug When generating an HTML report see code example below, the "Toggle details" feature doesn't work essentially there is not "toggling". Everything else is visible. Apologies if this might be a Pandas feature or not related to this package. A side note, I'm doing check_correlation=True because I'm dealing with 100M+ rows. Let me know if that is the right approach. To Reproduce: report = pandas_profiling.ProfileReport(report, check_correlation=True) report.to_file(outputfile="report.html") Version information: pandas_profiling version 1.4.1 Additional context Doing an inspect I see the following but, not sure how to implement toggle at this point: Toggle details . When using Pandas functionality like to_html and render_links=True there are errors.
